participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with a well-known translator, so I can learn more about the industry and get some advice on my own career.
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
my family gets together every saturday.
i started a new job this year , which is helping me learn more about socialization.
i am still living at home at age 30.

participant_2.background:
I go on long walks with my dogs to keep fit.
I'm on the go with my cosplay gear, so I have to work out to stay in shape.
i work as a freight truck driver.
i listen to rap.
i like going to rock concerts.

content.text: I heard a great talk on translating poetry last week. It really made me think about how I'd like to break into the industry.
Oh, that's really cool! I've been working as a freight truck driver for years, but I've always wanted to get into cosplay.
Really? That's interesting. Have you ever done any cosplay before?
Yeah, I've been doing it for a few years now. I really love going to rock concerts and dressing up as my favorite characters.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to try it, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough to get up on stage in front of a crowd.
It's definitely a lot of fun, but it can be nerve-wracking at first. But once you get into it, it's hard to stop.
I think I might have to give it a try sometime. Thanks for the inspiration!
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
Oh, and I also heard that you're a big fan of rap music. I'm a huge fan of hip-hop myself.
Yeah, I love rap music. It's so upbeat and energetic. It's the perfect music to listen to while I'm driving.
I know, right? It's the perfect music to get you pumped up.
I'm glad we have something in common. What are some of your favorite rap artists?
I love Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Logic. What about you?
I love all of those guys! I'm also a big fan of Drake, Kanye West, and Lil Wayne.
Nice! I love all of those guys too. We should definitely go to a concert together sometime.
That would be awesome! I'd love to go to a concert with you.
